subject: Suits and Litigation
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Whistle-Blowers
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis, who was stripped of the 2006 Tour de France title for doping, is claiming that Lance Armstrong’s former team defrauded the government.
snippet: Floyd Landis, who was stripped of the 2006 Tour de France title for doping, is claiming that Lance Armstrong’s former team defrauded the government.
